nodes.bodyText:
To be totally safe, I think you need to add a dot at the end of the package name. It's not a biggie for this one but might be in the future for other packages.
It's probably better to do it here than in the startsWith as it will avoid creating new strings.
Wouldn't these also need to go away?
Nevermind, my screen practically doesn't show the color GH uses to mark removal...
